description:
Mitsuhiro and the other Human Army pilots visit the café Rakuen on Tatsumiyajima. Billy excitedly devours his curry and Ai takes notice of Kazuki, while Mitsuhiro keeps a close eye on the scene and Maya watches them all with a thoughtful expression. Miwa has met Emery and the two happily converse in some special way that only they understand, while Miwa`s mother, Yumiko, watches with concern. Meanwhile, Fumihiko is shocked by the information offered by General Narain. A frightening situation that could change the world`s balance of power is pressing closer.
Source: crunchyroll
